com.camerontec.catalys.server.security.auth

Interface IUserManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JaasUserManager

    public interface IUserManager
    This defines an object which supports user login and user permissions based on action strings.

    When a user logs on he receives a String ticket. That ticket allows him to carry out certain actions.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkPermission(String ticket, String action)
      Checks whether the given ticket is authorized to carry out the given action.
      String[] getPermittedActions(String ticket)
      Returns all actions permitted for the given ticket.
      String getUserName(String ticket)
      Returns user name associated with given ticket.
      String login(String userName, String password)
      Logs in a user, returning a ticket if the password is OK.
      void logout(String ticket)
      Logs out the user with the given ticket.

    • Method Detail

      • checkPermission

        void checkPermission(String ticket,
                     String action)
              throws SecurityException
        Checks whether the given ticket is authorized to carry out the given action.
        Parameters:
        ticket - Authorization ticket as returned by a call to login(java.lang.String, java.lang.String).
        action - Action to be checked for permission.
        Throws:
        SecurityException - if the action is not allowed for the given ticket.

      • getPermittedActions

        String[] getPermittedActions(String ticket)
                      throws SecurityException
        Returns all actions permitted for the given ticket.
        Parameters:
        ticket - Authorization ticket as returned by a call to login(java.lang.String, java.lang.String).
        Returns:
        Array of actions allowed to ticket.
        Throws:
        SecurityException - if the ticket is invalid.

      • getUserName

        String getUserName(String ticket)
            throws SecurityException
        Returns user name associated with given ticket.
        Parameters:
        ticket - Authorization ticket as returned by a call to login(java.lang.String, java.lang.String).
        Returns:
        User name.
        Throws:
        SecurityException - if the ticket is invalid.

      • login

        String login(String userName,
             String password)
      throws Exception
        Logs in a user, returning a ticket if the password is OK.
        Parameters:
        userName - Name of user.
        password - Password of user.
        Returns:
        Authorization ticket.
        Throws:
        Exception - if the logon failed for any reason - for example if the user is unknown or the password is not correct.

      • logout

        void logout(String ticket)
        Logs out the user with the given ticket. The ticket is no longer valid.
        Parameters:
        ticket - Authorization ticket as returned by a call to login(java.lang.String, java.lang.String).
